# Pull Request

## Description
Please include a summary of your change and what it is intended to accomplish.
Include any relevant context or links to issues.

## How to Test
Provide steps to verify your changes work as intended.
Include example commands if applicable (e.g., `/hello`).

## Checklist
- [ ] My code runs without errors
- [ ] I have tested my changes locally
- [ ] I followed the coding style (e.g., black, flake8)
- [ ] I did not commit any secrets (tokens, keys)
- [ ] I understand my code and maintain it, even if AI-assisted
- [ ] My code uses slash commands
- [ ] I agree my contribution will be licensed under MIT for MO.RPG Bot
